des:
We strive to make home smarter and more convenient. 
Arani is now part of Alexa Connected Home. You can now voice control your home appliances, just simply say: 
"Alexa, turn on bedroom light"
"Alexa, turn off bedroom light"

You can also ask Alexa to set the brightness of your light by saying: 
"Alexa, set bedroom light to 10 percent"

Or change its color
"Alexa, set bedroom light to purple"

and even the color temperature
"Alexa, set bedroom light to warm white"

To get started:
1, You'll need a Arani Light.
2, Set it up to Wi-Fi network(has internet access) by using our Arani APP which can be downloaded at Google Play or App Store. 
After that you can start using the skill given that you have already linked your account to it.
